title: FS T206 Graded and Raw - HOF & Red Sox **Prices Reduced 11/28**

posts.post_title: FS T206 Graded and Raw - HOF & Red Sox **Prices Reduced 11/28**
posts.post_content:
Open to offers, especially if purchasing multiple cards. "I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.

***Photos Continued on Post 2***

All prices are net to me and include shipping. PPFF preferred.

Adding 12 HOFers and moving sold cards to the bottom.
